catalog_info.title: Tutorial - Junior Year
catalog_info.notes:
Elvira DiFabio and members of the Department Successful completion of one term of Italian 98 (or equivalent) is required of all thesis-track honors concentrators in Italian Studies.
This course is taught by members of the Department.
catalog_info.description: Weekly individual instruction for juniors pursuing a thesis honors track in Italian Studies, culminating in the writing of a 20-25 page research paper in Italian.
